class.name: tk_trajprocessor/PMPositionError
class.description: Position Error Module. Switches to NormalBrake if Positionerror gets too big.

class.name: tk_trajprocessor/PMObsAvoid
class.description: Position Mode: Obstacle Avoidance Module. Requires Obstacle Points Topic.

class.name: tk_trajprocessor/PMTrajectorySmoothing
class.description: Position Mode: Generate continuous jerk trajectories.

class.name: tk_trajprocessor/VMTrajectorySmoothing
class.description: Velocity Mode: Generate continuous jerk trajectories.

class.name: tk_trajprocessor/AMTrajectorySmoothing
class.description: Acceleration Mode: Generate continuous jerk trajectories.

class.name: tk_trajprocessor/VMObsAvoid
class.description: Velocity Mode: Obstacle Avoidance Module. Requires Obstacle Points Topic.

class.name: tk_trajprocessor/XMModeCheck
class.description: All Modes: Test for allowed input modes. Otherwise break.
